Town Council
============

Overview
--------

The Town of Prosper is a Home Rule Town with a Mayor and six Council Members who are elected at large for three-year terms.

1. ![Mayor Bristol - web small](https://www.prospertx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3354 "Mayor Bristol - web small")

   #### David F. Bristol

   Mayor

   [More Information](https://www.prospertx.gov/directory.aspx?eid=63)

Work Session
------------

* 5 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month
* Prosper Town Hall Council Chambers  
  250 W First Street

Regular Meeting
---------------

* 6:15 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month
* Prosper Town Hall Council Chambers  
  250 W First Street

### Watch Town Council Meetings

Prosper Town Council meetings are [streamed live online](https://prospertx.new.swagit.com/views/378/) and available to re-watch. Meeting videos are posted no later than 48 hours after a meeting.

### Public Comment Request Form

The public is invited to address the Town Council on any topic; however, the Council is unable to take action on any topic not listed on the agenda. Please fill out a [Public Comment Request Form](https://www.prospertx.gov/FormCenter/Town-Secretary-14/Public-Comment-Request-Form-83) and submit it to the Town Secretary prior to 4 pm on the day of the meeting.
